item.title: Fraud Detection Using Self-Organizing Maps
item.description: 1. What is Tensor Just a fancy word for an n-dimentional matrix Or an advanced array Holds only single type They are the standard way of representing data in tensorflow. 2. Tensor Data Types python typeÂ Description tf.float32 32 bits floating point tf.float64 64 bits floating point tf.int8 8 bits signed integer tf.int16 16 bits signed integer tf.
